title: 설정자료 저작자
content:
[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
* [[[about-the-scp-foundation|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/about-the-scp-foundation  About The SCP Foundation]" by "[[user Aelanna]]"  //et al.//
* [[[object-classes|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/object-classes  Object Classes]" by "[[user Aelanna]]"  //et al.//
* [[[personnel-and-character-dossier|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/personnel-and-character-dossier  Personnel And Character Dossier]" by "[[user Roget]]" //et al.//
 * [[[o5-command-dossier|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/o5-command-dossier  O5 Command Dossier]" by "[[user thedeadlymoose]]" //et al.//
* [[[groups-of-interest|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/groups-of-interest Groups of Interest]" by various artists
 * [[[ambrose-restaurant-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/ambrose-restaurant-hub Ambrose Restaurants Hub]" by "[[user Proasek]]", "[[user stormbreath]]", and "[[user Uncle Nicolini]]"
 * [[[anderson-robotics-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/anderson-robotics-hub  Anderson Robotics Hub]" by "[[user Jacob Conwell]]"
 * [[[are-we-cool-yet-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/are-we-cool-yet-hub  Are We Cool Yet? Hub]" by "[[user Smapti]]"
 * [[[black-queen-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/black-queen-hub Black Queen Hub]" by "[[user Silberescher]]", "[[user rumetzen]]" and "Gaffney"
 * [[[chaos-insurgency-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/chaos-insurgency-hub Chaos Insurgency Hub]" by "[[user Chubert]]", "[[user MissMercurial]]" and "[[user TwistedGears]]"
 * [[[chicago-spirit|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/chicago-spirit  GOI-001: Chicago Spirit]" by "[[user PeppersGhost]]"
 * [[[church-of-the-broken-god-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/church-of-the-broken-god-hub Church of the Broken God Hub]" by "[[user FortuneFavorsBold]]", "[[user Von Pincier]]" and "[[user Ihp]]"
 * [[[second-hytoth-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/second-hytoth-hub Church of the Second Hytoth Hub]" by "[[user NatVoltaic]]"
 * [[[dr-wondertainment-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/dr-wondertainment-hub  Dr. Wondertainment Hub]" by "[[user DarkStuff]]"
 * [[[gru-p-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/gru-p-hub Gru Division "P" Hub]" by "[[user Roget]]"
 * [[[marshall-carter-and-dark-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/marshall-carter-and-dark-hub Marshall, Carter & Dark Hub]" by "[[user Randomini]]" and "[[user Captain Cain]]"
 * [[[alexylva-university-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/alexylva-university-hub Alexylva University Hub]" by "[[user Rounderhouse]]" & "[[user Ihp]]" & "[[user Uncle Nicolini]]"
 * [[[three-moons-initiative-hub|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/three-moons-initiative-hub Three Moons Initiative Hub]" by "[[user daveyoufool]]"
* [[[security-clearance-levels|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/security-clearance-levels   Security Clearance Levels]" by "[[user Aelanna]]" //et al.//
* [[[secure-facilities-locations|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/secure-facilities-locations  Secure Facilities Locations]" by "[[user Aelanna]]" //et al.//
 * [[[secure-facility-dossier-research-site-45|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/secure-facility-dossier-research-site-45  Secure Facility Dossier: Research Site-45]" by "[[user LurkD]]"
 * [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-64|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/secure-facility-dossier-site-64 Secure Facility Dossier: Site-64]" by "[[user Jacob Conwell]]"
 * [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-77|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/secure-facility-dossier-site-77  Secure Facility Dossier: Site-77]" by "[[user Roget]]"
 * [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-81|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/secure-facility-dossier-site-81  Secure Facility Dossier: Site-81]" by "[[user djkaktus]]"
 * [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-88|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/secure-facility-dossier-site-88  Secure Facility Dossier: Containment Site-88]" by "[[user Doctor Cimmerian]]"
 * [[[secure-facility-dossier-lunar-area-32|]]] is based on "[http://www.scp-wiki.net/secure-facility-dossier-lunar-area-32 Secure Facility Dossier: Lunar Area-32]" by "[[user Jack Ike]]"

author: Salamander724
